<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Barkeep](/NPCs.aspx?ID=944)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Barkeeps are often friends and mentors within a community, lending an ear while supplying libations. The best barkeeps have some talent for storytelling and passing on valuable advice.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Publican_Barkeep.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Barkeep](/NPCs.aspx?ID=944)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 238</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Alcohol Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +6, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +8, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +6, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +5, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +0

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
barkeep's apron (functions as [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3)), flask of whiskey, [pewter mug](/Equipment.aspx?ID=36), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 25

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sap +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pewter mug +3 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Bar Brawler**   The barkeep has been in enough bar fights to know how to throw a few punches. When fighting in their bar and making a [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attack, the barkeep gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and deals an additional 1d4 damage.

**Barkeep's Advice** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The barkeep gives some pertinent advice to a single creature other than themself. For 24 hours, when that creature fails a skill check or saving throw, they can recall this advice and reroll the check, using the second result instead. Once that creature uses this ability, its effect ends. A creature that receives the Barkeep's Advice is temporarily immune to the ability for 1 month.

</column>
